name: Firmware Update
summary: Learn about .FW files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Firmware controls how a hardware device communicates with other hardware devices. Periodically, hardware manufacturers may release firmware updates, which fix firmware bugs or allow a device to communicate with additional (often newer) types of devices.
Sometimes, manufacturers provide firmware updates to users in the form of FW files. After receiving an FW file, users are meant to install it on an appropriate device.

description: An FW file contains information used to update a device's firmware. Many types of devices, including digital cameras and portable media players, use updates saved as FW files. Typically, users install an FW file on a device by transferring the file to the device's memory card or connecting the device to their PC via a USB port.

instructions: Most FW files are not meant to be manually opened. To install an FW file on a device, refer to that device's user manual or the instructions included with the file.
If you are an advanced user who wants to analyze the data an FW file contains, you can do so using Binwalk (multiplatform).
